_sText:
A simple map for The Hurt Blocker achievement. The map will automatically perform the achievement. You can make yourself some coffee and the achievement will already be completed.

Before entering, make sure that the "Include CPU players (bots) in this game" checkbox is lit and the number of bots is 1.

ATTENTION: After this map, your use button will break. To fix it, just write in the console: -use
